pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, August 29, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, August 29, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a State Luncheon hosted by the Their Excellencies The Right Honourable David Johnston, Governor General of Canada, and Mrs. Sharon Johnston in honour of King Abdullah II of Jordan.

Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage for toasts at the beginning of the lunch
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:45 a.m.
  • To cover events at Rideau Hall, media representatives must be accredited in advance by the Parliamentary Press Gallery and must confirm their attendance with the Rideau Hall Press Office:
    • Marie-Ève Létourneau
      613-998-0287
      613-302-0912 (cell)
      marie-eve.letourneau@gg.ca
  • For further accreditation information, please contact the Press Gallery: pressres2@parl.gc.ca.

1:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the welcoming ceremony for King Abdullah II of Jordan.

Rotunda, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with King Abdullah II of Jordan.

Prime Minister’s Office, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with King Abdullah II of Jordan.

Foyer, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
